Typography

<h1> h1 heading </h1>
<h1 class="lg"> h1 .lg heading </h1>
<h1 class="sm"> h1 .sm heading </h1>

h1 heading

h1 .lg heading

h1 .sm heading

<h2>h2 heading</h2>

h2 heading

<h3>h3 heading</h3>

h3 heading

<h4>h4 heading</h4>

h4 heading

<h5>h5 heading</h5>

h5 heading

<h6>h6 heading</h6>

h6 heading

<p> This is a regular string with text </p>
<p class="lg"> text with class .lg </p>
<p class="sm"> text with class .sm </p>

This is a regular string with text

text with class .lg

text with class .sm

<p>
  You can use the mark tag to   <mark>highlight</mark>   text.
</p>

You can use the mark tag to highlight text.

<p>
  <del> This line of text is meant to be treated as deleted text. </del>
</p>

This line of text is meant to be treated as deleted text.

<p>
  <ins>This line of text is meant to be treated as an addition to the document.</ins>
</p>

This line of text is meant to be treated as an addition to the document.

<p>
  <strong>This line rendered as bold text.</strong>
</p>

This line rendered as bold text.

<p>
 <small>This line of text is meant to be treated as fine print.</small>
</p>

This line of text is meant to be treated as fine print.

<p>
  <em>This line rendered as italicized text.</em>
</p>

This line rendered as italicized text.

Modal window

<button class="my-modal btn" type="button">Open popup</button>

<div class="modal" id="my-modal">
  <div class="modal__content">
   <button class="modal__btn-close" type="button">X</button>
   <p>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Autem consectetur expedita inventore iste nobis
    nostrum. Aliquam architecto assumenda beatae culpa ducimus id ipsum molestiae, nisi optio perspiciatis
    quaerat quo, voluptatibus?</p>
  </div>
</div>

<script>
   modal(".my-modal", ".modal__btn-close", "#my-modal", [timer]);
</script>

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Autem consectetur expedita inventore iste nobis nostrum. Aliquam architecto assumenda beatae culpa ducimus id ipsum molestiae, nisi optio perspiciatis quaerat quo, voluptatibus?
